mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT YEAR (created_at) FROM orders ORDER BY YEAR (created_at) DESC

SELECT MONTH(o.created_at) AS month, COALESCE(SUM(od.order_price * od.order_quantity), 0) AS totalSales FROM orders o LEFT JOIN orderdetails od ON o.id = od.order_id WHERE YEAR(o.created_at) = #{year} GROUP BY MONTH(o.created_at) ORDER BY MONTH(o.created_at)

SELECT o.id, o.user_id, o.order_amount, o.created_at, MONTH(o.created_at) AS month, o.order_amount AS total_sales FROM orders o WHERE o.created_at BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
